column2: §YSent a Physician§!
You have already sent a Physician to China, you will not be able to send another one.

In exchange for §R50% income§!, §R30% troop reinforcement rate§! and §R[GetChineseOffmapTributaryPrestigeCost]§!, receive §G2 Grace per month§! and §Ga Chinese regiment to raise as the defender in a war§!.\nThese effects last until the end of the Empire's §Yruling dynasty§!, or until §Yyou declare independence§! (through war, or decision in the Intrigue screen).\n

Under Chinese Imperialism you:
§Y*§! Can hold cities
§Y*§! Do not care if others do not follow your religion nor can you demand their conversion

§Y*§! Can not create or usurp Empires
§Y*§! Follow the special Temple Name convention of naming rulers
§Y*§! Are limited to non-elective succession laws

§YCommander Requirements§!:
Must be a valid Commander with at least 12 martial
Must not hold any land

Must NOT stand to inherit any titles
Must NOT have any of the traits: §YIncapable§!, §YInbred§!, or §YImbecile§!

Must be a close relative of yours
Must be adult
Must be younger than 45 year old
Must NOT be married or betrothed
Must NOT have any of the traits: §YIncapable§!, §YInbred§!, §YImbecile§!

§YEunuch Requirements§!:
Must be an adult male of great skill, OR a close relative of yours at least 12 years old
Must not hold any land
Must NOT have any of the traits: §YIncapable§!, §YInbred§!, or §YImbecile§!

To complete the ambition you need to perform §Y3§! of the following tasks:
 §Y*§! Win a Holy War

Note that you can complete the same task multiple times.
